comment: Mr. Terry is one of the nicest professors ever. Very easy and his tests are just a copy of the study guide. FX Observation/Reflection, Group Project, Research Project, and 2 tests. Just come to class and you'll make an A!
Professor Terry was great , I would Definitley recommend him. His test are easy, you just have to attend class. TAKE HIM!!
Good guy! Love him.  Easy class, but I didn't really pay enough attention for some of the tests, so that effected my grade.  Just pay attention and pass easily!
Mr. Terry is awesome. Extremely helpful prof. He even called my cell phone to remind me of an assignment.

Very Easy class but prof. Terry isn't always clear when it comes to explaining assignments. Was confused/unclear about assignments a lot of the time. The test rely heavily on the book. STUDY FOR THE FINAL! Overall easy class ok prof.
Mr. Terry was great. He was interesting and helpful. The class was very easy. Attend and participate and get an 'A'. I would definitely take another class with him if possible.
